caption: there are two vases that are sitting next to each other
description: There are two vases placed side by side on a wooden table, one with a red ceramic handle and the other featuring a blue glass body, their surfaces contrasting in color and texture. The vases are positioned horizontally, with the red vase slightly taller than the blue one, creating a visual hierarchy. A soft green light filters through the space, casting gentle shadows across both vessels. One vase holds a white flower in its center, while the other contains a fresh juice mixture, showcasing a variety of elements within the scene. The arrangement maintains a calm, peaceful atmosphere, emphasizing the natural beauty of the objects placed together.
